title: VVits miserie, and the vvorlds madnesse discouering the deuils incarnat of this age.
author: Lodge, Thomas, 1558?-1625.
publisher: Printed by Adam Islip, and are to be sold by Cutbert Burby, at his shop by the Roiall-Exchange,
notes: The author's name, Thomas Lodge, appears on A3r.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
